title: I can't transfer data from my old Oppo A37 to my new pixel 4a
content: I've connect my old phone to my new phone correctly but I can't transfer data.  the new phone says I may need to allow permissions on my old phone, but I can't find anywhere on my old Oppo phone where I need to allow this.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4a
